Detailed Description

This class represents a list of IPs that should not be accepted as valid connection destinations nor sources.

It provides an interface to query whether or not a specific IP is filtered.

Currently this class can handle IPRange files in the Peer-Guardian format and the AntiP2P format, read from either text files or text files compressed with the zip compression format.

This class is thread-safe.

Member Function Documentation

bool CIPFilter::IsFiltered ( uint32  IP2test,
bool  isServer = false 
)

Checks if a IP is filtered with the current list and AccessLevel.

Parameters:
IP2test The IP-Address to test for.
isServer Whether this IP belongs to a server or a client. Needed for statistical purposes only.
Returns:
True if it is filtered, false otherwise.

Note: IP2Test must be in anti-host order (BE on LE platform, LE on BE platform).

References m_mutex.

void CIPFilter::Update ( const wxString &  strURL  ) 

Starts a download of the ipfilter-list at the specified URL.

Parameters:
A valid URL.

Once the file has been downloaded, the ipfilter.dat file will be replaced with the new file and Reload will be called.

References m_URL.
